Morrissey Betty Meyer Ron Payne David Carr Ronnie Bonnie Burns Mi chael Green and Dorothy Dottie Marbach 20Th SUNDAY IN ORDINARY TIME AUGUST 20 2017 YR From the Pastors Desk ALL PEOPLES ARE INVITED TO WORSHIP GOD AND SHARE IN HIS DIVINITY My dear brothers and sisters in Christ in the name of the Lord Jesus I say peace with you all Everybody is invited to come to God and share in Him as His sons and daugh ters It is a universal invitation and call But the problem of the syndrome of I am bet ter than you triumphalism has stained the human race including the Church We must do our best to see that we are better than them we are right they are wrong com plex do not jeopardize our salvation Thanks to St Pope John XXIII who through the Vatican Council II opened the windows and strove to do away with ghetto mentality Belonging to Gods chosen people does not mean that we are necessarily better than other people who follow their own good conscience seek God in a unique way Todays readings show an openness in love and respect for others The opening prayer of today liturgy shows Gods open invitation It says God your care extends be yond the boundaries of race and nation to the heart of all who live May the walls which prejudice raises between us crumble beneath the shadow of your outstretched arm So for God all are welcome to His Kingdom It is Justice and Salvation for all Thus in the 1st Reading Is 561 67 Prophet Isaiah tells us that God welcomes any one Jews and Gentiles alike No discrimination Thus said the Lord The foreigners who join themselves to the Lord ministering to him them I will bring to my holy mountain and make joyful in my house of prayer for my house shall be called a house of prayer for all peoples You see that Gods house is for all of us I hope you are working seriously to be there And in the Gospel Mt 152128 Jesus by receiving the Canaanite woman a pagan who has tremendous faith shows universality of Gods invitation and acceptance into His Kingdom for all who did his will Jesus apparent rejection of the woman was in tentional It was used by the Lord Jesus to teach us the importance of faith And that the Kingdom of God is for all of us Nobody is excluded except the one who excludes one self from the Kingdom We all are invited to imitate the faith the trust and great humil ity of the Canaanite woman Listen to this Jesus said to the woman It is not right to take the food of the children and throw it to house dogs If you were the Canaanite woman what would you have done In great prudence and humility and trust she said to Jesus Please Lord for even the dogs eat the scraps that fall from the table of their master Wonderful Then Jesus Exclaimed woman great is your faith Let it be done for you as you wish And instantly the womans daughter was healed from that hour Great Wonderful Amazing So Heaven is for us all What are you really doing about it God bless you Msgr Pius Ilechukwu Heaven is for us all I hope you are doing something about it NB 1 We are organizing Marriage Encounter Parish Based Please register quickly 2 We are also planning a Pilgrimage to the Holy Land next year It will be after Easter I believe that you are interested to join so contact Ja.net Lehman at (260)824-0367 or Stacey Coulardot at (260)466-1224 Hurry 3 The Parish Picnic is on September 10 at Roush Park 925 Silver Street Bluffton IN 46714 We have 2 Masses that weekend On Saturday Sep 9 2017 Mass 5:00pm On Sunday Sept 10 2017 Mass 10:00am please note there will not be a 7:30am Mass that morning SCHEDULE MASS INTENTIONS The most beautiful gift one can give to another person is a Spiritual Bouquet of the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass No material gift can ever compare to or equal the Infinite Value of the Holy Mass Call the Parish office to schedule 8241380 Masses may be scheduled for the living as well as the deceased There is nothing so great as the Eucharist If God had something more pre cious He would have given it to us Saint Jean Vianney May only good things come your way Every moment of today The amount needed each week to make budget is 511640 We are 84760 ahead of budget from last week Other Collections within our Parish St Bluffton Sign up on the sheet in the narthex RCIA RITE OF CHRISTIAN INITIATION FOR ADULTS Each year on Holy Saturday during the Easter Vigil thousands are baptized into the Catholic Church in the United States Par ishes welcome these new Catholics through the Rite of Christian Initiation of Adults RCIA If you are interested in finding out more about the Catholic faith or wish to become a Catholic RCIA classes will begin Thursday September 7th at 7:30pm Catho lics who wish to deepen their Catholic faith may also attend Please contact the Parish office to obtain a Registration Form Mt 23112 Sun Aug 27 TwentyFirst Sunday in Ordinary Time Is 2219 23 Rom 113336 Mt 161320 ALPHA You are invited to be part of a pilot group to partici pate in Alpha at St Josephs Alpha is a series of ses sions designed to help deepen our Christian faith Each session will include some hospitality with food a talk on a question regarding faith and open sharing and conversation St Josephs Evangelization Team will be offering this pilot series over 11 Fridays beginning September 8 at 5:30pm Attendance at every session is not required After the series this pilot group would be asked for their thoughts on whether we should offer Alpha par ishwide Please join us We want to know what you think THE PONTIFICAL SOCIETY FOR THE PROPAGATION OF THE FAITH Diocese of Fort WayneSouth The weekend of September 23 2017 we will have a second collection for the universal missionary aspect of the Church and our participation in the Diocesan Missionary CoOp Program for 2017 Fr Show Reddy Allam from Immaculate Conception Church Braidwood IL will be here to cele brate Mass with and for us There will not be a second collection for the RepairRainy Day Fund that weekend HE WHO SINGS WELL PRAYS TWICE
